title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crisp.
Beat the eggs and mix with the cheese and pepper.
Drain the pasta and combine with the pancetta.
Mix everything with the egg mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Fry onions until golden, add tomato puree and cream.
Add the chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
